mapper.sql: id, createid, publishTime, updateTime, updateManId, linkName, mobile, reason, status
mapper.select: select e.linkName,e.mobile,e.reason,e.status,u.username, CASE WHEN m.mobile IS NOT NULL and m.mobile != '' THEN m.mobile WHEN m.email IS NOT NULL and m.email != '' THEN m.email END AS account from t_e_expertSupport e LEFT JOIN t_m_member m on e.createid = m.id left join t_oms_user u on e.updateManId = u.id where e.id = #{id}

select e.id,date_format(e.publishTime,'%Y-%m-%d') publishTime,e.linkName,e.status, CASE WHEN m.mobile IS NOT NULL and m.mobile != '' THEN m.mobile WHEN m.email IS NOT NULL and m.email != '' THEN m.email END AS account from t_e_expertSupport e LEFT JOIN t_m_member m on e.createid = m.id WHERE 1=1
and (m.email like CONCAT('%',#{account},'%') or m.mobile like CONCAT('%',#{account},'%'))
and e.linkName like CONCAT('%',#{linkName},'%')
and e.status = #{status}
order by e.publishTime desc
